game: It is said that the Magic Mirror knows all the knowledge of the world. In order to find this treasure the brave team sets out for the tower of the magic forest.      There are Five randomly generated paths filled with crises and surprises.    According to the characteristics and status of different heroes move their positions to take advantage of strengths and avoid weaknesses to overcome the difficulties step by step.      The thorns is everywhere and the monsters so scary? No matter!    50+ treasures and 70+ blessings combine to make your team more powerful or interesting.    There are also potions and tools provided by the merchants to help you overcome the crisis.      Now begin your automatic casualroguelite adventure!

It is said that the Magic Mirror knows all the knowledge of the world. In order to find this treasure the brave team sets out for the tower of the magic forest.      There are Five randomly generated paths filled with crises and surprises.    According to the characteristics and status of different heroes move their positions to take advantage of strengths and avoid weaknesses to overcome the difficulties step by step.      The thorns is everywhere and the monsters so scary? No matter!    50+ treasures and 70+ blessings combine to make your team more powerful or interesting.    There are also potions and tools provided by the merchants to help you overcome the crisis.      Now begin your automatic casualroguelite adventure!

A team of four sets out on a journey to find the magic mirror. Change the position of the adventurers to determine whether they will be greeted by： monsters，trapsor treasure！ Your wisdom will lead the brave team through this wonderful adventure!
Minimum:OS: win7/win8/win10/win11Processor: i3Memory: 2 GB RAMStorage: 2 GB available space
Recommended:OS: win7/win8/win10/win11Processor: i5Memory: 4 GB RAMStorage: 4 GB available space
